name: dA category/deviation/user filter
description:
Filter deviations/images on deviantart by serval options:
 - username
 - user ID
 - category
 - title

If you choose title, the entry can't completely be hidden, only the image won't display.
additional_info: To add a rule, you have to edit the style with stylish and change or add your filter. If you want to "block" a user, edit the style and change in the line .stream > div.tt-a[username="Chikukko"], Chikukko to another username (without ~ or * ) or copy and create more lines: .stream > div.tt-a[username="user1"], .stream > div.tt-a[username="user2"], For categorys, enter them without spaces and in small letters.
